name: Hunters Life
description:
Hunters Life is a game where you have to go through different rooms. Each room has a finish point
and to solve this you need to find clues and combine them to open up next room. The game is simple, it can be finished quickly depending on your mind skills.
There are a total of 6 rooms. All levels need to be open in differents way. Can you use your mind and complete all rooms?
